# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_KEEP_ENGINE_ON_WHEN_ABANDONED

## Summary
Flags the vehicle to keep the engine on after being abandoned

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** keepEngineOn
